Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Wow, this is an incredible breakfast spot. It feels like a normal small cafe, but they put out some excellent food. If you‚Äôre going for breakfast, try to get there early, as it seems to get busy pretty quickly. If your hotel is nearby, this is a much better (and better priced) place to grab the most important meal of the day.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Very cute brunch / diner place! Had a delicious oatmeal with a side of avocado, and my boyfriend had the shakshuka which was also well done.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great local coffee and bistro style food. Perfect Dutch building and very friendly staff. Coffee choice is good as is the non diary milk choice.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Small, quiet cafe on the corner. Quick service with good coffee and food. This seems to be a perfect place for people watching.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Amazing brunch, the price is not so cheap but you will be served beautiful and well cooked dishes.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Cute little cafe/diner. They make a good breakfast here. I had typical eggs and toast. The coffee was quite good. Most of the menu is organic and there are good healthy options (yummy avocado). The service was good and the prices were reasonable.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Absolutely delicious. Fresh home made food, its not pretentious and what you order is what you get. Lots of healthy options amd the staff was very friendly. Decor is cozy and there are seats outside as well. Definitely recommend for a light breakfast or lunch.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Nice Food, the flat white is also good. Like everywhere free wifi üëå

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: It was so nice to find something fresh in such a tourist area. We found this place tucked quietly in the back . The staff was pleasant and the food was great. We loved our morning eggs and cappuccinos. They have a variety of healthy options to choose from and we would definitely go back again.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great! Just what we needed. Good quality good service and away from city agitation.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Loved this small breakfast spot on a main thoroughfare that leads back to the train area.  Brioche and scones were very good as was coffee.   Staff very friendly.  Fun to sit by the window and people watch.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Fresh food - great breakfast, 100% worth the wait!!

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Nice quite place to eat breakfast. Pop it get some fresh well flavored meals and coffee. The espresso has a nice citrusy. I had the herb eggs, a different take on scrambled eggs. The eggs were cooked perfectly however the bitterness of the ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: My Wife and I got up earlier than expected the morning after we flew in from the States. We were staying at the Inntel Hotel right next door and we went in to get breakfast and coffee. Great place. It's tiny, but there is a nice dining room ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: This place was definitely worth stumbling upon. Very cute and charming interior to enjoy your time in, friendly service, and food was very good! They have a salad with beans, avocado, and tomatoes that was so good I had to go back and get more of, even though we were only visiting for a few days.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Stopped here for a coffee to take the weight off my feet from all the walking amsterdam has to offer, friendly staff and the cakes looked delicious, but I didn't get the chance to try any! Great spot for people watching!

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great options for breakfast and lunch! The Shakshuka is incredible!

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Excellent coffee, warm service,  very good, fresh food.  I went several times for lunch and breakfast. A welcome find in a area carpeted with "Steakhouses" and grease spots.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: LOVED this place. Great food, great coffee, lovely staff. Tiny space though, so don't go with a big party, at least not to sit in.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Nice place to grab a coffee, very nice staff. It's cards only. Did not try any food but looks good. All organic and locally grown food.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: The porridge with banana, walnuts, and cocoa nibs was great!

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: A great breakfast spot. It has a Middle Eastern influenced menu. Delicious vegetarian breakfast with poached eggs, babaganoush, hommous, tomatoes and toast.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: What a special place this is. One of the most brilliant spots we have ever been to. Favourite! Highly recommended. Healthy delicious food.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Had the full English breakfast here - the tomatoes were fresh and delicious. A cozy atmosphere, and convenient location.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Amazing food! Plenty of vegan and veggie options...and great coffee. Seriously. It‚Äôs a diamond in the rough. It‚Äôs wonderful.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: The food is very fresh and has fantastic flavors. Portion sizes are very good and the setting is great for watching the world go by.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Lots of breakfast options from usual poached eggs to more mediterranian inspired ones like artichoke or grilled aubergine.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text:
Really sweet little breakfastlocation. Excellent food and good coffee.
Absolutely recommended.
Try the Baba Ganoush Bread.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great and high quality food in a small, lovely cafe. You can also sit outside, it's directly nearby a street though.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great coffee, wonderful service, and really good food. Well worth going out of your way to try it.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Delicious and healthy food, welcoming people and cosy place to have brunch. I recommend

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Nice spot to plan your trip or hang out :)

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Everything is freshly made. Was a very good experience and the owners were really nice and friendly! Definitely recommend

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great coffee and friendly service. Unfortunately the eggs were overcooked and the food wasn‚Äôt hot enough.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Super cozy and hip place with cute staff. Great choice for breakfast!

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Friendly staff, good music, amazing comfort and healthy food, I highly recommend this little place in Amsterdam for people who want to experience the city in the most cosy and comfortable way.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Came here because I heard the porridge/oatmeal was great and it was. Also do very nice coffee and the space is really nice.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Nice ambient. Had tea and some kind of bruschetti sandwich with salad here. It was good.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Good healthy breakfast. Good atmosphere, but a bit pricey.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great breakfast, kind staff, beautiful cafe... perfect

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Really good quality food, and super nice little restaurant. Would go there any time again.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Delicious chicken curry masala sandwich. Well-balanced, topped with a few pickled vegetables.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Excellent coffee and some of the best oatmeal porridge I've ever had

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Very nice,  cozy place for a break. Coffee really good üòä

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Air the English Omega 3 breakfast and the porridge with banana. Recommend!

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Cosy spot in Amsterdam. Very fresh food with nice outside terrace :)

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Food was very nice, and staff were friendly.

Name: Vinnies
Review Text: Great breakfast , superb ginger and lemon tea

Great place for coffee and sandwiches.

Review Text: Good food good service. Homemade lemonade is good too!
